title: Bug 10050StyledText  Change selection color when changing background color
description: It's great to see that it is now possible to change background color inEclipse!
OB: Bug 10050StyledTextChange selection color when changing background color
EB: I prefer to use a dark blue backgrund, since I find it morecomfortable to the eye, and easier to read.However, it is at the moment not possible to change the selection color inEclipse, which defaults toyou've guessed itdark blue, rendering thepossibility to set the background color completely useless to me.The best solution would probably be to let the user choose the selection color,but at least Eclipse should choose a selection color that is distinguishablefrom the user selected background color.
